metatags.author: Nick Evans
metatags.og:title: Ohio begins offering mobile ID with Apple, but it can't be used to vote or during traffic stops • Ohio Capital Journal
metatags.og:description: Last month, Ohio joined a handful of other states allowing residents to load their Driver’s License or ID card onto an Apple iPhone. It’s a nifty feature but for circumstances like voting or a traffic stop you'll still need your physical card.
metatags.twitter:creator: @nckevns
